attributes.action: Mind over money: Stop cutting the mental health service budget.
attributes.additional_details: Over the last parliament the government has cut just under 600 million pounds in the mental health service. We need to help to protect our mental health service for the good of the British people and children.
attributes.background:
Everyday the NHS is having to decrease their funding to the mental health service and everyday more and more people are losing their lives due to cuts.

"Over the last two years I have experienced anxiety and watched my friends go through similar issues. The NHS is the only resource for us."
